channel.title: Qt5 on Daker Pinheiro

item.title: QML Theming/Styling (Update)
item.description: This post is an update about the research project from my team, described a few weeks ago. From the time we published the last post about QML Styling until now we have worked on this set of issues/features: Get feedback about research project Combo Box Component Combo Box Customizable Style Combo Box Plastique Style SubControl Styling Understand SceneGraph internals Understand other native platform internals I will detail what was possible to make for each of these topics in sessions below.
